entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h then light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
